Membership Has its
Benefits!
Welcome to
Hollywood Beach Golf Club
, a coastal gem in the heart of South Florida just steps from the Atlantic Ocean. With a rich history dating back to 1924, and a fully renovated and reimaginedâ€¦brand new golf course and clubhouse, HBGC invites you to experience golf in a relaxed, welcoming environment that puts community first and tradition at the forefront.
Scroll down to find out more about our membership offerings and start enjoying these great additional benefits of being an HBGC Member.
Early Adopter Membership Program
Join the revitalized Hollywood Beach Golf Club as an Early Adopter and enjoy exclusive access, savings, and special preview events before our official reopening!
ğŸ  Hollywood Resident Annual Membership â€“ Individual
Retail Rate: $3,800
First 10 members: $2,800
(SOLD OUT)
Next 20 Members: $3,300
(NEW)
NON-HOLLYWOOD RESIDENT Annual Membership â€“ Individual
Retail Rate: $6,600
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§â€ğŸ‘¦ Hollywood Resident Annual Membership â€“ Family
Retail Rate: $5,700
First 10 families: $4,500
(ONLY 4 REMAIN)
Next 10 Families: $5,100
*Includes spouse/domestic partner and up to two dependents under age 18. Each additional dependent: $600*
ğŸ‰ Early Preview Member Benefits
Private guided tours of the newly refurbished Hollywood Beach Golf Club
Invitations to exclusive preview events
Priority tee time booking before the grand opening
Recognition as a Founding Member
ğŸ¢ Annual Corporate Membership
Retail Value: $12,500 per year
Hollywood Business Grassing Special: $7,600 (Limited-Time Offer)
Includes access for up to four (4) company designees
Additional designees can be added at a discounted rate of $3,800 each
Only 5 corporate memberships available at this special rate
ğŸ¯ Be Part of the Future of Hollywood Golf
With major course renovations and a new vision for the clubâ€™s future, we invite our neighbors and local businesses to become early champions of this community asset.
ğŸ“ Contact: 954.927.1751
ğŸ“§ Email: hollywoodbeachgolf@gmail.com
Note: All prices are subject to a 7% Florida sales tax.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQâ€™s)
ğŸ’°
Membership Pricing & Eligibility
Q:
Do prices include tax?
A: No â€” sales tax is additional.
Q:
Whatâ€™s the age limit for a Junior Membership?
A: Under 30 years old.
Q:
I do not live in Hollywood, and I am not out of state. Is there a discount for non-Hollywood residents?
A: Yes! We now offer a Non-Hollywood Resident Annual Membership option.
View membership options Â»
Q:
I live just outside Hollywood. Can I receive the Hollywood resident rate?
A: Proof of City of Hollywood residency is required (driverâ€™s license, utility bill, or lease).
Hollywood residents receive a special rate because they approved the Hollywood on the GO Bond, which funds improvements like the Hollywood Beach Golf Club through local property taxes.
Learn more about the GO Bond Â»
Q:
Are there additional dues?
A: No â€” just the annual membership fee and any applicable cart fees.
Q:
What is the guest rate?
A: Guest rates will be announced soon â€” check back for updates.
Q: Can I pay online?
A: Yes! You can join today using our secure online checkout. Your membership starts once we open.
Join now Â»
Q:
I paid online as a Hollywood resident, but I am a non-resident. What happens next?
A: All members must verify residency. If verification is not provided, the non-resident rate will be applied. Residency verification can be uploaded online after purchase.
â³
Early Adopter Program
Q:
When does the Early Adopter special offer end?
A: This is a limited-time offer and based on available spots in each category. Donâ€™t wait â€” once spots are gone, rates increase!
Q:
How many Early Adopter memberships are available?
A: Individual, Family, and Corporate memberships each have limited availability. Updated counts are posted on our website.
Q:
Can I play right away if I join now?
A: Yes! Memberships are for the 2026 season, but early signups may receive added perks and access to exclusive events.
ğŸŸï¸
10-Round Play Card
Q:
What is the deadline to purchase the 10-Play Card?
A: August 31, 2025 â€” secure yours before itâ€™s gone!
Buy now Â»
Q:
What timeframe is the 10-Play Card valid for?
A: Valid any day, anytime between January and December 2026.
Q:
Does the 10-Play Card expire?
A: Yes â€” it expires after 10 plays or December 2026, whichever comes first.
ğŸ 
Facilities & Amenities
Q:
Will the new clubhouse have a locker room?
A: No, but it will feature a bag room (available for an additional fee) and other valuable amenities.
Q:
Is there a practice area for irons?
A: No â€” the practice area is designed for pitching and putting. A simulator will also be available for lessons and fun short game events.
Q:
How big will the Pro Shop and bar area be?
A: Weâ€™ll share more details soon. View the Virtual Tour link
here.
Q:
Will there be an outside patio, and will it be covered?
A: Yes â€” a covered patio will be available for year-round enjoyment.
ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§
Programming & Events
Q:
Will you offer programming or lessons for children?
A: Yes! Details on youth programs will be announced soon. Stay tuned.
ğŸŒï¸
Course Design
Q:
Who designed the new course?
A: Richard Mandell Golf Architecture was selected for the redesign.
While historically attributed to Donald Ross (1924), research suggests the original 1923 planâ€”used as inspirationâ€”may have been created by Willie Park Jr.
ğŸ’¡
Pro Tip
: For the most up-to-date information, visit our
Membership Page
or call us at (954) 922-8755.
